courses.title: English Composition I
courses.description: Fundamental writing skills, critical thinking, and communication. Emphasis on essay writing, grammar, and composition techniques.

courses.title: English Composition II
courses.description: Advanced writing skills with focus on research methods, argumentative writing, and literary analysis.

courses.title: College Algebra
courses.description: Functions, graphs, equations, and mathematical modeling. Foundation for higher mathematics.
courses.prerequisites: High school algebra or placement test

courses.title: Statistics
courses.description: Descriptive and inferential statistics, probability, hypothesis testing, and data analysis.

courses.title: General Biology I
courses.description: Introduction to biological principles including cell structure, genetics, evolution, and ecology.

courses.title: General Chemistry I
courses.description: Fundamental principles of chemistry including atomic structure, bonding, and chemical reactions.

courses.title: World History to 1500
courses.description: Survey of world civilizations from ancient times to 1500, examining cultural, political, and social developments.

courses.title: Introduction to Psychology
courses.description: Overview of psychological principles, research methods, and major areas of psychology.

courses.title: Introduction to Business
courses.description: Overview of business principles, management, marketing, finance, and entrepreneurship.

courses.title: Introduction to Computer Science
courses.description: Fundamentals of programming, problem-solving, and computational thinking using Python.

courses.title: Art Appreciation
courses.description: Survey of visual arts including painting, sculpture, architecture, and contemporary art forms.

courses.title: Music Theory I
courses.description: Fundamentals of music theory including notation, scales, intervals, and basic harmony.

courses.title: Physical Education
courses.description: Physical fitness activities, sports, and wellness education.

courses.title: Introduction to Christianity
courses.description: Survey of Christian beliefs, history, and practices. Core curriculum requirement.

courses.title: American Literature
courses.description: Survey of American literature from colonial period to present, analyzing major works and movements.

courses.title: Calculus I
courses.description: Limits, derivatives, applications of derivatives, and introduction to integration.

courses.title: Human Anatomy & Physiology
courses.description: Structure and function of human body systems. Required for pre-health students.

courses.title: Organic Chemistry I
courses.description: Structure, properties, and reactions of organic compounds. Essential for chemistry and pre-med students.

courses.title: Developmental Psychology
courses.description: Human development from conception through death, examining physical, cognitive, and social changes.

courses.title: Principles of Marketing
courses.description: Marketing concepts, consumer behavior, market research, and marketing strategies.

courses.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
courses.description: Implementation and analysis of data structures, algorithm design, and computational complexity.

courses.title: Public Speaking
courses.description: Development of public speaking skills, speech preparation, and presentation techniques.

courses.title: Principles of Macroeconomics
courses.description: Economic principles at the national level including GDP, inflation, unemployment, and fiscal policy.

courses.title: Fundamentals of Nursing
courses.description: Basic nursing skills, patient care, medical terminology, and clinical practice fundamentals.
courses.prerequisites: BIOL201, CHEM101, admission to nursing program

courses.title: Educational Psychology
courses.description: Learning theories, motivation, classroom management, and assessment in educational settings.

courses.title: Financial Management
courses.description: Corporate finance principles, investment analysis, and financial decision-making.

courses.title: Database Systems
courses.description: Database design, SQL, normalization, and database management systems.

courses.title: Music Performance
courses.description: Advanced performance techniques, repertoire study, and public performance opportunities.

courses.title: Studio Art
courses.description: Advanced studio practice in chosen medium, portfolio development, and artistic expression.

courses.title: Research Methods in Social Sciences
courses.description: Advanced research methodologies, statistical analysis, and thesis preparation for graduate students.

courses.title: Leadership and Organizational Behavior
courses.description: Advanced study of leadership theories, organizational dynamics, and management strategies.

courses.title: Strategic Management
courses.description: Corporate strategy, competitive analysis, and strategic decision-making for business leaders.

courses.title: Pharmacology
courses.description: Drug mechanisms, therapeutic applications, and clinical pharmacology for healthcare professionals.

courses.title: Advanced Creative Writing
courses.description: Workshop-based advanced creative writing in fiction, poetry, or creative nonfiction.
courses.prerequisites: Bachelor's degree in English or related field

courses.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
courses.description: Introduction to machine learning algorithms, supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and AI applications.

courses.title: Web Development with React
courses.description: Modern web development using React, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design principles.

courses.title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
courses.description: Network security, cryptography, ethical hacking, risk assessment, and cybersecurity frameworks.

courses.title: Mobile App Development
courses.description: iOS and Android app development using Swift and Kotlin, mobile UI/UX design, and app deployment.

courses.title: Game Development with Unity
courses.description: Game design and development using Unity engine, C# programming, 2D/3D graphics, and game physics.

courses.title: Entrepreneurship and Startup Strategy
courses.description: Business plan development, startup funding, market analysis, and entrepreneurial mindset.

courses.title: Digital Marketing and Social Media
courses.description: Digital marketing strategies, social media management, SEO, content marketing, and analytics.

courses.title: Project Management
courses.description: Project planning, resource management, team leadership, agile methodologies, and project tools.

courses.title: Biotechnology and Genetic Engineering
courses.description: Genetic engineering techniques, CRISPR, bioethics, and biotechnology applications in medicine and agriculture.

courses.title: Pharmaceutical Chemistry
courses.description: Drug design, medicinal chemistry, pharmacokinetics, and pharmaceutical development processes.

courses.title: Applied Statistics and Data Analysis
courses.description: Advanced statistical methods, data visualization, R programming, and statistical modeling.

courses.title: Modern Physics and Quantum Mechanics
courses.description: Quantum mechanics principles, atomic physics, nuclear physics, and modern physics applications.

courses.title: Advanced Patient Care Techniques
courses.description: Advanced nursing procedures, patient assessment, medication administration, and clinical decision-making.

courses.title: Global Health and Epidemiology
courses.description: Disease prevention, public health policy, epidemiological methods, and global health challenges.

courses.title: Cognitive Psychology and Neuroscience
courses.description: Cognitive processes, brain function, memory, attention, and neuropsychological assessment.

courses.title: Digital Media and Communication
courses.description: Digital storytelling, multimedia production, social media strategy, and digital communication ethics.

courses.title: Technology in Education
courses.description: Educational technology tools, online learning platforms, digital pedagogy, and classroom integration.

courses.title: Digital Humanities and Historical Research
courses.description: Digital tools for historical research, data visualization, archival methods, and digital storytelling.

courses.title: UI/UX Design Principles
courses.description: User interface design, user experience research, prototyping, design thinking, and usability testing.

courses.title: Music Production and Audio Engineering
courses.description: Digital audio workstations, recording techniques, mixing, mastering, and music technology.

courses.title: Theatre Arts and Performance
courses.description: Acting techniques, stage performance, theatre history, script analysis, and character development.

courses.title: Advanced Machine Learning and Deep Learning
courses.description: Deep neural networks, convolutional networks, recurrent networks, reinforcement learning, and AI research methods.

courses.title: Advanced Web Development and Cloud Computing
courses.description: Microservices architecture, cloud platforms (AWS, Azure), DevOps, containerization, and scalable web applications.

courses.title: Cybersecurity and Ethical Hacking
courses.description: Advanced penetration testing, security analysis, incident response, digital forensics, and security policy.

courses.title: Data Science and Big Data Analytics
courses.description: Big data processing, Hadoop, Spark, machine learning at scale, data mining, and predictive analytics.

courses.title: Mobile Application Architecture
courses.description: Advanced mobile development, cross-platform frameworks, mobile security, performance optimization, and app store deployment.

courses.title: Advanced Game Development and Graphics
courses.description: 3D graphics programming, game engine development, virtual reality, augmented reality, and interactive media.

courses.title: Innovation and Entrepreneurship Strategy
courses.description: Venture capital, startup ecosystems, innovation management, technology commercialization, and entrepreneurial finance.

courses.title: Digital Business Transformation
courses.description: Digital strategy, business model innovation, technology adoption, change management, and digital leadership.

courses.title: Advanced Project and Operations Management
courses.description: Strategic project management, operations optimization, supply chain management, and organizational leadership.

courses.title: Advanced Biotechnology and Bioengineering
courses.description: Synthetic biology, tissue engineering, bioinformatics, pharmaceutical development, and biotechnology research methods.

courses.title: Advanced Chemistry and Materials Science
courses.description: Nanomaterials, polymer chemistry, catalysis, spectroscopy, and advanced chemical synthesis methods.

courses.title: Applied Mathematics and Computational Modeling
courses.description: Numerical methods, computational mathematics, mathematical modeling, optimization, and scientific computing.

courses.title: Advanced Physics and Quantum Computing
courses.description: Quantum computing principles, quantum algorithms, quantum information theory, and quantum hardware development.

courses.title: Advanced Practice Nursing and Healthcare Leadership
courses.description: Advanced clinical practice, healthcare administration, nursing research, quality improvement, and healthcare policy.

courses.title: Global Health Policy and Healthcare Systems
courses.description: Healthcare policy analysis, health economics, global health initiatives, public health management, and health equity.

courses.title: Advanced Cognitive Psychology and Behavioral Research
courses.description: Advanced research methods, experimental design, cognitive neuroscience, behavioral analysis, and psychological assessment.

courses.title: Advanced Digital Communication and Media Strategy
courses.description: Strategic communication, crisis communication, digital media management, audience analytics, and communication research.

courses.title: Advanced Educational Technology and Learning Design
courses.description: Learning management systems, instructional design, educational assessment, online pedagogy, and curriculum development.

courses.title: Advanced Digital Design and Interactive Media
courses.description: Advanced UI/UX design, interactive installations, digital art, virtual reality design, and creative technology.

courses.title: Advanced Music Technology and Sound Design
courses.description: Advanced audio production, sound synthesis, music software development, acoustic analysis, and electroacoustic composition.

courses.title: Advanced Theatre Arts and Performance Studies
courses.description: Advanced acting techniques, theatre research, performance theory, directing, and theatrical production management.
